body: Hi Aymeric, See [this discussion](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/problem-with-honeybee-radparameter-component?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1445787&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987). Honeybee has an internal check that adjusts the parameters. You can comment that line out.
